other_information: The application for use of the aerodrome can be obtained by email, phone or before landing on frequency Točná RADIO. If English is necessary, it is possible to receive approval by email at airport@tocna.cz at least 48 hours in advance. Use RWY center for taxiing, not the safety strips. Lipence aircraft model air field with occasional operation of larger models, about 3,5 km from Točná airport in the direction of point Echo. Use extra caution.
